verses.verse: Moreover the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto me, Take <WH3947> <WH8798> thee a great <WH1419> roll <WH1549>, and write <WH3789> <WH8798> in it with a man's <WH582> pen <WH2747> concerning Mahershalalhashbaz <WH4122>.

And I took <WH5749> unto me faithful <WH539> <WH8737> witnesses <WH5707> to record <WH5749> <WH8686>, Uriyah-yahu <WH223> the Kohen <WH3548>, and Z'kharyah-yahu <WH2148> the son <WH1121> of Jeberechiah <WH3000>.

And I went <WH7126> <WH8799> unto the prophetess <WH5031>; and she conceived <WH2029> <WH8799>, and bare <WH3205> <WH8799> a son <WH1121>. Then said <WH559> <WH8799> the YY <WH3068> to me, Call <WH7121> <WH8798> his name <WH8034> Mahershalalhashbaz <WH4122>.

For before the child <WH5288> shall have knowledge <WH3045> <WH8799> to cry <WH7121> <WH8800>, My father <WH1>, and my mother <WH517>, the riches <WH2428> of Damascus <WH1834> and the spoil <WH7998> of SHomron <WH8111> shall be taken away <WH5375> <WH8799> before <WH6440> the king <WH4428> of Ashur <WH804>.
The YY <WH3068> spake <WH1696> <WH8763> also unto me again <WH3254> <WH8686>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Forasmuch <WH3282> as this people <WH5971> refuseht <WH3988> <WH8804> the waters <WH4325> of Shiloah <WH7975> that go <WH1980> <WH8802> softly <WH328>, and rejoice <WH4885> in Rezin <WH7526> and Remaliah's <WH7425> son <WH1121>;

Now therefore, behold, the YY <WH136> bringeth up <WH5927> <WH8688> upon them the waters <WH4325> of the river <WH5104>, strong <WH6099> and many <WH7227>, even the king <WH4428> of Ashur <WH804>, and all his glory <WH3519>: and he shall come up <WH5927> <WH8804> over all his channels <WH650>, and go over <WH1980> <WH8804> all his banks <WH1415>:

And he shall pass <WH2498> <WH8804> through Y'hudah <WH3063>; he shall overflow <WH7857> <WH8804> and go over <WH5674> <WH8804>, he shall reach <WH5060> <WH8686> even to the neck <WH6677>; and the stretching out <WH4298> of his wings <WH3671> shall fill <WH4393> the breadth <WH7341> of thy land <WH776>, O `Immanu'EL <WH6005> <WH410>.

Associate <WH7489> <WH8798> yourselves, O ye people <WH5971>, and ye shall be broken in pieces <WH2865> <WH8798>; and give ear <WH238> <WH8685>, all <WH3605> ye of far <WH4801> countries <WH776>: gird <WH247> <WH8690> yourselves, and ye shall be broken in pieces <WH2865> <WH8798>; gird <WH247> <WH8690> yourselves, and ye shall be broken in pieces <WH2865> <WH8798>.

Take <WH5779> counsel <WH6098> together <WH5779> <WH8798>, and it shall come to nought <WH6565> <WH8714>; speak <WH1696> <WH8761> the word <WH1697>, and it shall not stand <WH6965> <WH8799>: for 'Elohim <WH410> is with us.

For the YY <WH3068> spake <WH559> <WH8804> thus to me with a strong <WH2393> hand <WH3027>, and instructed <WH3256> <WH8765> me that I should not walk <WH3212> <WH8800> in the way <WH1870> of this people <WH5971>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Say <WH559> <WH8799> ye not, A confederacy <WH7195>, to all them to whom this people <WH5971> shall say <WH559> <WH8799>, A confederacy <WH7195>; neither fear <WH3372> <WH8799> ye their fear <WH4172>, nor be afraid <WH6206> <WH8686>.
Sanctify <WH6942> <WH8686> the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635> himself; and let him be your fear <WH4172>, and let him be your dread <WH6206> <WH8688>.

And he shall be for a sanctuary <WH4720>; but for a stone <WH68> of stumbling <WH5063> and for a rock <WH6697> of offence <WH4383> to both <WH8147> the houses <WH1004> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, for a gin <WH6341> and for a snare <WH4170> to the inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> of Yerushalayim <WH3389>.
And many <WH7227> among them shall stumble <WH3782> <WH8804>, and fall <WH5307> <WH8804>, and be broken <WH7665> <WH8738>, and be snared <WH3369> <WH8738>, and be taken <WH3920> <WH8738>.
Bind up <WH6887> <WH8798> the testimony <WH8584>, seal <WH2856> <WH8798> the Torah <WH8451> among my Talmidim <WH3928>.
And I will wait <WH2442> <WH8765> upon the YY <WH3068>, that hideth <WH5641> <WH8688> his face <WH6440> from the house <WH1004> of Ya`akov <WH3290>, and I will look <WH6960> <WH8765> for him.

Behold, I and the children <WH3206> whom the YY <WH3068> hath given <WH5414> <WH8804> me are for signs <WH226> and for wonders <WH4159> in Yisra'EL <WH3478> from the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635>, which dwelleth <WH7931> <WH8802> in mount <WH2022> TZiyon <WH6726>.

And when they shall say <WH559> <WH8799> unto you, Seek <WH1875> <WH8798> unto them that have familiar spirits <WH178>, and unto wizards <WH3049> that peep <WH6850> <WH8772>, and that mutter <WH1897> <WH8688>: should not a people <WH5971> seek <WH1875> <WH8799> unto their 'Elohim <WH430>? for the living <WH2416> to the dead <WH4191> <WH8801> ?
To the Torah <WH8451> and to the testimony <WH8584>: if they speak <WH559> <WH8799> not according to this word <WH1697>, it is because there is no light <WH7837> in them.

And they shall pass <WH5674> <WH8804> through it, hardly bestead <WH7185> <WH8737> and hungry <WH7457>: and it shall come to pass, that when they shall be hungry <WH7456> <WH8799>, they shall fret <WH7107> <WH8694> themselves, and curse <WH7043> <WH8765> their king <WH4428> and their 'Elohim <WH430>, and look <WH6437> <WH8804> upward <WH4605>.

And they shall look <WH5027> <WH8686> unto the earth <WH776>; and behold trouble <WH6869> and darkness <WH2825>, dimness <WH4588> of anguish <WH6695>; and they shall be driven <WH5080> <WH8794> to darkness <WH653>.
